search.query: index=$index$ sourcetype=connectors-observer$sourcetype_suffix$ OR sourcetype=connectors-rest$sourcetype_suffix$ "lvl=ERROR" | timechart span=$span$ count(sourcetype) by sourcetype

panel.title: ADF Pipelines Failed with System Errors in Last 30 Days (span = 1 Day)

search.query: index=$index$ sourcetype=azure-metrics$ADFpipeline$ "/SUBSCRIPTIONS/*/RESOURCEGROUPS/*/PROVIDERS/MICROSOFT.DATAFACTORY/FACTORIES/*" "SystemError" | timechart span=1d count(_raw) as FailedCount

panel.title: ADF Pipelines Failed with User Errors in last 30 Days (span = 1 Day)

search.query: index=$index$ sourcetype=azure-metrics$ADFpipeline$ "/SUBSCRIPTIONS/*/RESOURCEGROUPS/*/PROVIDERS/MICROSOFT.DATAFACTORY/FACTORIES/*" "UserError" | spath category | search category="PipelineRuns" level=Error | timechart span=1d count(_raw) as FailedCount

index=$index$ sourcetype=connectors-observer$sourcetype_suffix$ "c.a.p.d.connectors.azure.http.wire.filter:102" | rex field=_raw "c.a.p.d.connectors.azure.http.wire.filter:102 - < (?<retcode>.*)" | timechart span=1h count by retcode

index=$index$ sourcetype=connectors-observer$sourcetype_suffix$ "Retrieved the healthStatus=5*" | rex field=_raw " for serviceName=(?<from>.*) with response" | search from!=NULL | timechart span=1m count(from) by from

index=$index$ sourcetype=connectors-rest$sourcetype_suffix$ "Retrieved the healthStatus=5*" | rex field=_raw " for serviceName=(?<from>.*) with response" | search from!=NULL | timechart span=1m count(from) by from
index=$index$ sourcetype=connectors-rest$sourcetype_suffix$ srv="connectors-rest" "lvl=ERROR" | rex field=_raw ":[\d]+\s-\s(?<failure>[\w\s]+)" | stats count(failure) by failure
index=$index$ sourcetype=connectors-observer$sourcetype_suffix$ srv="connectors-catalog-observer" "lvl=ERROR" | rex field=_raw ":[\d]+\s-\s(?<failure>[\w\s]+)" | stats count(failure) by failure
index=$index$ sourcetype=connectors-rest$sourcetype_suffix$ srv="connectors-rest" "lvl=ERROR" | stats count(imsOrg) by imsOrg
index=$index$ sourcetype=connectors-observer$sourcetype_suffix$ srv="connectors-catalog-observer" "lvl=ERROR" | stats count(imsOrg) by imsOrg
index=$index$ sourcetype=connectors-observer$sourcetype_suffix$ srv="connectors-catalog-observer" "lvl=ERROR" | stats count as Total

index=$index$ sourcetype=connectors-observer$sourcetype_suffix$ srv="connectors-catalog-observer" "lvl=ERROR" "for Tenant=" | rex field=_raw "Tenant=(?<tenant>[\w]+@AdobeOrg)" | stats count(tenant) by tenant
index=$index$ sourcetype=connectors-rest$sourcetype_suffix$ srv="connectors-rest" "lvl=ERROR" | stats count as Total
index=$index$ sourcetype=connectors-rest$sourcetype_suffix$ srv="connectors-rest" "lvl=WARN" "for Tenant=" | rex field=_raw "Tenant=(?<tenant>[\w]+@AdobeOrg)" | stats count(tenant) by tenant

index=$index$ sourcetype=connectors-observer$sourcetype_suffix$ srv="connectors-catalog-observer" "Reached a Pipeline Sync Marker message" | where like(CONTAINER_TAG,"%-"+"$environment$"+"-%") | timechart span=$span$ count(sourcetype) by sourcetype
index=$index$ sourcetype=connectors-observer$sourcetype_suffix$ srv="connectors-catalog-observer" "Sent Pipeline Sync Marker message" | timechart span=$span$ count(sourcetype) by sourcetype
index=$index$ sourcetype=connectors-observer$sourcetype_suffix$ srv="connectors-catalog-observer" "Received ping pipeline message" | timechart span=$span$ count(sourcetype) by sourcetype
index=$index$ sourcetype=connectors-observer$sourcetype_suffix$ srv="connectors-catalog-observer" "Error while sending Pipeline Sync message" | timechart span=$span$ count(sourcetype) by sourcetype
index=$index$ sourcetype=connectors-observer$sourcetype_suffix$ srv="connectors-catalog-observer" "Message=\"Fatal Thread Exception\"" | timechart span=$span$ count(sourcetype) by sourcetype

index=$index$ sourcetype=connectors-observer$sourcetype_suffix$ OR sourcetype=connectors-rest$sourcetype_suffix$ "lvl=INFO" | rex field=_raw "Retries exceeded on api=(?<retry>\[(.*?)\])" | stats count(retry) by retry
index=$index$ sourcetype=connectors-observer$sourcetype_suffix$ OR sourcetype=connectors-rest$sourcetype_suffix$ "lvl=INFO" "Retries exceeded on api=" | stats count(Organization) by Organization

index=$index$ sourcetype=connectors-observer$sourcetype_suffix$ OR sourcetype=connectors-rest$sourcetype_suffix$ "lvl=INFO" | rex field=_raw "Attempting to retry on api=(?<retry>\[(.*?)\])" | stats count(retry) by retry

chart.title: Attempting to retry by IMS ORG

search.query: index=$index$ sourcetype=connectors-observer$sourcetype_suffix$ OR sourcetype=connectors-rest$sourcetype_suffix$ "lvl=INFO" "Attempting to retry on api=" | stats count(Organization) by Organization
index=$index$ sourcetype=connectors-observer$sourcetype_suffix$ srv="connectors-catalog-observer" "Quarantined message caused by service error=" | stats count as Total
index=$index$ sourcetype=connectors-observer$sourcetype_suffix$ "lvl=INFO" "Quarantined message caused by service error=" | stats count(errorCode) by errorCode
index=$index$ sourcetype=connectors-observer$sourcetype_suffix$ "lvl=INFO" "Quarantined message caused by service error=" | stats count(dependentService) by dependentService
index=$index$ sourcetype=connectors-observer$sourcetype_suffix$ "lvl=ERROR" "Failed to quarantine Catalog message" | stats count as Total

index=$index$ sourcetype=connectors-observer$sourcetype_suffix$ srv="connectors-catalog-observer" "Handling pipeline event of type" | rex field=_raw "event of type=(?<type>[\w]+)" | timechart span=$span$ count(type) by type limit=1000

index=$index$ sourcetype=connectors-observer$sourcetype_suffix$ srv="connectors-catalog-observer" "Handling pipeline event of type" | rex field=_raw "for entity=(?<entity>[\w]+)" | timechart span=$span$ count(entity) by entity limit=1000
index=$index$ sourcetype=connectors-observer$sourcetype_suffix$ | timechart span=$span$ count by host
index=$index$ sourcetype=connectors-rest$sourcetype_suffix$ | timechart span=$span$ count by host

index=$index$ sourcetype=azure-metrics$ADFpipeline$ | spath resourceId | spath level | spath category | search category="PipelineRuns" level=Error resourceId="/SUBSCRIPTIONS/*/RESOURCEGROUPS/*/PROVIDERS/MICROSOFT.DATAFACTORY/FACTORIES/*" | table _time, category, pipelineName, level, failureType, properties.Parameters.imsOrgId, resourceId, start
index=$index$ sourcetype=connectors-observer$sourcetype_suffix$ OR sourcetype=connectors-rest$sourcetype_suffix$ "lvl=WARN" | timechart span=$span$ count(sourcetype) by sourcetype
index=$index$ sourcetype=connectors-rest$sourcetype_suffix$ srv="connectors-rest" "lvl=WARN" | stats count as Total
index=$index$ sourcetype=connectors-rest$sourcetype_suffix$ srv="connectors-rest" "lvl=WARN" | rex field=_raw ":[\d]+\s-\s(?<failure>[\w\s]+)" | stats count(failure) by failure
index=$index$ sourcetype=connectors-observer$sourcetype_suffix$ srv="connectors-catalog-observer" "lvl=WARN" | stats count as Total
index=$index$ sourcetype=connectors-observer$sourcetype_suffix$ srv="connectors-catalog-observer" "lvl=WARN" | rex field=_raw ":[\d]+\s-\s(?<failure>[\w\s]+)" | stats count(failure) by failure

panel.title: Connectors - Missing Temporal field on DSV Errors

search.query: index=$index$ sourcetype=connectors-observer$sourcetype_suffix$ OR sourcetype=connectors-rest$sourcetype_suffix$ "lvl=ERROR" "Failed to find temporalField on DatasetView=" | stats count(imsOrg) by imsOrg
index=$index$ sourcetype=connectors-observer$sourcetype_suffix$ "lvl=ERROR" | rex field=_raw "Failed to (?<failure>[\w\s]+)" | stats count(failure) by failure | sort count(failure) desc
index=$index$ sourcetype=connectors-rest$sourcetype_suffix$ "lvl=ERROR" | rex field=_raw "Failed to (?<failure>[\w\s]+)" | stats count(failure) by failure | sort count(failure) desc

table.title: Retries Exceeded in last 24Hours in Rest and Observer

search.query: index=$index$ sourcetype=connectors-observer$sourcetype_suffix$ OR sourcetype=connectors-rest$sourcetype_suffix$ "lvl=INFO" | rex field=_raw "Retries exceeded on api=(?<retry>\[(.*?)\])" | stats count(retry) by retry

table.title: Possible Data Loss Because of Failed Pipelines (Last 24 Hours)

search.query: index=$index$ sourcetype=azure-metrics$ADFpipeline$ | spath properties.Parameters.ingestionEnd | spath resourceId | spath level | spath category | search category="PipelineRuns" level=Error resourceId="/SUBSCRIPTIONS/*/RESOURCEGROUPS/*/PROVIDERS/MICROSOFT.DATAFACTORY/FACTORIES/*" | spath properties.Parameters.ingestionStart | rename properties.Parameters.ingestionStart as ingestionStart | rename properties.Parameters.ingestionEnd as ingestionEnd | table resourceId, ingestionStart, ingestionEnd, pipelineName | sort ingestionStart | stats count by ingestionStart, ingestionEnd, pipelineName | search count > 1
